taxman.translation[0].definitions[0].def: someone whose job is collecting taxes
taxman.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: Taxmen are finding it harder to keep up with clever finance directors.
taxman.translation[1].definitions[1].def: the government department that collects taxes
taxman.translation[1].definitions[1].exa: They managed to hide part of their profits from the taxman.
